recommended_actions: Try over-the-counter antacids like calcium carbonate or magnesium hydroxide.
Avoid trigger foods such as spicy foods, caffeine, alcohol, chocolate, and citrus fruits.
Elevate the head of your bed by 6-8 inches.
Lose weight if overweight or obese.
Schedule a follow-up appointment with your doctor if symptoms persist or worsen.
suggested_tests: None are urgently required at this time.  A physician might suggest upper endoscopy or esophageal pH monitoring if symptoms persist or are severe.
result.disclaimer: This information is for general knowledge and informational purposes only, and does not constitute medical advice.  This AI is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.  Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.  Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on this AI.
